short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extention helpful for child education activity monitoring

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus Ninja acts as a friendly guide helping users focus on their productive tasks online (Online classes for kids, Competitive exam preparation for teenagers and productive work for professional) in a fun engaging way. It also nudges them for safe internet usage and protect them from potential online hazards

It is a solution to nudge kids to positive habits around use of technology devices and help them develop healthy online behaviour. It also provides parents an ability to monitor kids activities online and ensure that kid is not exposed to potential online hazards (Exposure to Porn, Gambling and fishing , Bullying on social media platforms ..)
